title: Structural Equation Modeling-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing Learning Approaches and Self-Efficacy in Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design theory and practical experience, foundational statistics knowledge (optional)
context.additional_context: Establishment of digital tool-based environments and operation of project-based feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their learning approaches (ALD) using survey-based partial least squares structural equation modeling (PLS-SEM)
Learners can diagnose strengths/weaknesses and develop improvement plans through Self-Efficacy in Learning Design (SELD) scale assessments
Learners can enhance self-efficacy by over 20% when applying deep learning strategies to design projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
